name: colorHunt
description: An open-source platform for color scheme inspiration with thousands of curated trendy color palettes.

name: colorBrewer
description: The original color palette generator, also supporting colorblindness. Arguably the best scientifically.

name: colorCurves
description: Color palette generator that uses curves to generate color schemes.

name: duo
description: Duo is a collection of color combinations I've curated from personal projects or found across the web.

name: coolors
description: Color palette generator with advanced customization features.
